allocation_method.description: The method used to allocate the discount

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the price rule in the GraphQL Admin API

created_at.description: The date and time when the price rule was created

customer_segment_prerequisite_ids.description: An array of customer segment IDs as prerequisites for the discount

updated_at.description: The date and time when the price rule was last updated

customer_selection.description: The customer selection criteria for the discount

ends_at.description: The date and time when the discount ends

entitled_collection_ids.description: An array of collection IDs entitled to the discount

entitled_country_ids.description: An array of country IDs entitled to the discount

entitled_product_ids.description: An array of product IDs entitled to the discount

entitled_variant_ids.description: An array of variant IDs entitled to the discount

id.description: The unique identifier for the price rule

once_per_customer.description: Whether the discount can only be applied once per customer

prerequisite_customer_ids.description: An array of customer IDs required as prerequisites for the discount

prerequisite_quantity_range.description: The required quantity range for the discount

greater_than_or_equal_to.description: The minimum quantity required for the discount

prerequisite_saved_search_ids.description: An array of saved search IDs that act as prerequisites for the discount

prerequisite_shipping_price_range.description: The maximum shipping price required for the discount

less_than_or_equal_to.description: The maximum shipping price allowed for the discount

prerequisite_subtotal_range.description: The required subtotal range for the discount

greater_than_or_equal_to.description: The minimum subtotal required for the discount

prerequisite_to_entitlement_purchase.description: The amount required for a purchase to be entitled to the discount

prerequisite_amount.description: The required amount for entitlement to the discount

starts_at.description: The date and time when the discount starts

target_selection.description: The target selection criteria for the discount

target_type.description: The type of target for the discount

title.description: The title of the price rule

usage_limit.description: The limit on the total number of times the discount can be used

prerequisite_product_ids.description: An array of product IDs required as prerequisites for the discount

prerequisite_variant_ids.description: An array of variant IDs required as prerequisites for the discount

prerequisite_collection_ids.description: An array of collection IDs required as prerequisites for the discount

value_type.description: The type of value for the discount

prerequisite_to_entitlement_quantity_rat.description: The quantity ratio required for entitlement to the discount

prerequisite_quantity.description: The quantity required as prerequisites for the discount

entitled_quantity.description: The quantity entitled to the discount

allocation_limit.description: The maximum number of times the discount can be applied

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the price rule is applied

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the price rule was deleted

deleted_message.description: Message displayed when the price rule is deleted

deleted_description.description: Description of why the price rule was deleted
